column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The croissants are amazing
column2: albeit pricey. They're still huge and an awesome treat and I will gladly pay for them any day. My favorite is the almond
column3: but the plain and chocolate are also fantastic - you can really taste the quality of the ingredients in the chocolate one. The keugelhopf is an acquired taste and not my favorite thing on the menu
column5: especially if you have less of a sweet tooth. The chocolate chip cookies are fantastic (I think I prefer them to Tiny Boxwood's) and again
column7: but huge and made with good chocolate.
